results.title: A Retrospective, Observational, EMR-Based Real-World Evidence Study to Assess the Incidence of Pedal Edema in Essential Hypertensive Patients on Amlodipine or Cilnidipine
results.text_hl: Overall, the mean duration of onset of @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@ was 69 days for @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ while 51 days for @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ (Figure 4(c)).

citations.NLM: Dalal J, Sawhney JP, Jayagopal PB, Hazra PK, Khan MY, Gaurav K, Pinto C, Mane A, Rao S, Jain M. A Retrospective, Observational, EMR-Based Real-World Evidence Study to Assess the Incidence of Pedal Edema in Essential Hypertensive Patients on Amlodipine or Cilnidipine Int J Hypertens. 2022;2022():6868143. PMID: 35251710

results.title: Ambulatory blood pressure response to S-amlodipine in Korean adult patients with uncontrolled essential hypertension: A prospective, observational study
results.text_hl: Comparison between @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine@@@ has demonstrated a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@ with the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim DK, Ahn JH, Lee KH, Kang SH, Kim SS, Na JO, Park SD, Ahn KT, Lee JH, Jung IH, Seo J, Choi WG. Ambulatory blood pressure response to S-amlodipine in Korean adult patients with uncontrolled essential hypertension: A prospective, observational study J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2022 Mar;24(3):350-357. PMID: 35188327

results.title: Comparative peripheral edema for dihydropyridines calcium channel blockers treatment: A systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@Nifedipine@@@ plus angiotensin receptor blocker (SUCRA: 92.3%) did not mitigate @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ plus angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (SUCRA: 16%) reduced @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@ the most.

citations.NLM: Liang L, Kung JY, Mitchelmore B, Cave A, Banh HL. Comparative peripheral edema for dihydropyridines calcium channel blockers treatment: A systematic review and network meta-analysis J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2022 May;24(5):536-554. PMID: 35234349
citations.BibTeX: @article{35234349, title={Comparative peripheral edema for dihydropyridines calcium channel blockers treatment: A systematic review and network meta-analysis}, author={Liang L and Kung JY and Mitchelmore B and Cave A and Banh HL}, journal={J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich)}, volume={24}, number={5}, pages={536-554}}

results.title: [Swelling of the labial gingiva of the teeth].
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@swelling@@@ was caused by the antihypertensive @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, which he used because of arterial @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ due to a @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Raaff PI, van der Meij EH, de Visscher JGAM. [Swelling of the labial gingiva of the teeth]. Ned Tijdschr Tandheelkd. 2023 Jul;130(7-8):322-325. PMID: 37428459

results.title: Unusual case of pleural effusion caused by amlodipine in a dog with systemic hypertension
results.text_hl: In a previous veterinary study, there were two cases of @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@ as an adverse drug event of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in which they were administered the maximum dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (Creevy et al.,).

citations.NLM: Jang HW, Park SM, Hwang SY, Kang K, Choi M, An JH, Chae HK, Oh YI, Youn HY. Unusual case of pleural effusion caused by amlodipine in a dog with systemic hypertension Vet Med Sci. 2022 Mar;8(2):445-449. PMID: 35132803

results.title: Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension
results.text_hl: Interestingly, in this @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ population, only four of 109 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (3.7%) experienced @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ when treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 5 mg daily, increased to 10 mg daily after 6 weeks, if needed.

citations.NLM: Wang JG, Palmer BF, Vogel Anderson K, Sever P. Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2023 Aug 7;():. PMID: 37551050

results.title: Amlodipine as a Suggested Cause of Yellow Nail Syndrome: A Case Report
results.text_hl: The presumptive diagnosis was @DISEASE_Yellow_Nail_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D056684 @@@YNS@@@. Assuming @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ as a cause of interstitial @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@, it was stopped, and the symptoms improved gradually.

citations.NLM: Al Houri H, Al-Tarcheh H, Zghaier O, Salloum S, Haj Ibrahim A, Kouli M. Amlodipine as a Suggested Cause of Yellow Nail Syndrome: A Case Report Cureus. 2022 Sep;14(9):e29396. PMID: 36304383

results.title: Cilnidipine for Amlodipine Induced Pedal Edema and its Anti-hypertensive Effect in a Tertiary Care Teaching Hospital of Western Nepal.
results.text_hl: Up to 15% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ develop @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ that may lead to discontinuation.
